# MapAnnotationProtocol

**Protocol**

A protocol that represents the possible return types of annotations.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol MapAnnotationProtocol
```

## Overview

Don’t create types conforming to this protocol. Instead, use one of the framework-provided types [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapAnnotation], [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapMarker], and [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapPin].

## Annotations in SwiftUI

- **MapMarker**: A balloon-shaped annotation used to indicate the location on a map.
- **MapPin**: A pin-shaped annotation used to indicate a location on a map.
- **MapAnnotation**: A customizable annotation that marks a map location.

## Conforming Types

- MapAnnotation
- MapMarker
- MapPin
